H0.text: Which is the most powerful chess piece. Rook

H1.text: Which is the most powerful chess piece. Bishop

H2.text: Which is the most powerful chess piece. Knight

H3.text: Which is the most powerful chess piece. Quene

A4.text: The standard valuation is one point for a pawn, three points for a knight or bishop, five points for a rook, and nine points for a queen.
